thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 16 of 465
thread.title: Bree
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by Bree

author: Bree
title: Bree
text: So far, I've had pleasant experiences shopping here. From the wood bunk bed I purchased 15 years ago that is still very sturdy to the new home furniture I'm purchasing today. I feel I'm getting a great quality for the price. There are a few issues I've had in the past, like an iron that didn't last very long and also some Rachel Ray cookware that didn't stand the test of time (less than a year actually), but I don't feel that's something NFM could control. All in all, I will continue to shop here.
